Unfortunately I cannot recommend this game. I used to have a good review for it, but my experiences with the game has only gotten worse. I've seen some toxic communities, but this one is probably the worse I've seen yet. I've been told repeatedly to kill myself, that I deserve to be r*ped, had every harsh name under the sun thrown at me, all because I either win or don't do what the other person wanted. 
As others have said, reporting means nothing in this game. I can report until I'm blue in the face and BHVR will simply turn a blind eye. They simply do not care, and that sense of apathy has spread throughout the game. You get the occasional player who tries to show kindness and be that light in the cesspit that is this game, but they're few and far between. 
I have dedicated so much of my time to this game, and have met wonderful friends within the community, but I have also had the displeasure of interacting with people who view the game as a pass to verbally abuse others. 

Until BHVR either starts caring about the game or the game dies, I wouldn't recommend buying it, for your own mental health.

Now that I've came along way since my previous review on this game, my view and opinion has changed. This game goes how you make it to go, if you want to have fun then go run a fun perk build, want to sweat then run a sweaty build. but there is one thing that will never change, and that is my love for the Dredge, it's so cute!

Juego de mierda, esta bueno pero es una mierda. Primero, 15 minutos minimo a la noche para encontrar un partido. Con full party. Despues los servidores se viven cayendo,, vas al menu de fin de partido.  te saca del partido termina y te reinicia no te da los puntos, pero te saca lo uqe usaste en el inventario. Cualquiera
Y ni hablar de que el juego se ve para el orto, que no me jode. Si un juego es bueno los graficos no me joden. Pero esta bloqueado a 60 fps......estamos en el 2021. Claramante los devs les chupa un huevo y no se esfuerzan. Desde que juntaron XBOX y PS4 con PC la verdad que se fue a la mierda. 

Igual el juego esta bueno y es divertido, mas si jugas con amigos. Te cagas de risa un buen rato pero es para tener en cuenta. Entre cada partido me leo un libro, me hecho un cago y rezo a mahoma.

This game isn't only a buggy mess that doesn't work, its a buggy mess that stops working every month.
every fucking month there's a new problem with launching this frankly mediocre game. 
(edit: some brazilian guy fixed it for me, still a buggy game tho)

I have gotten more hours then I usually would thanks to my friends. Ill admit its very fun to play but its so unbalanced that survivor could be downright un fun sometimes. The strongest killers greatly outclass the weaker killers to the point where you only go against the same 2 killers. The killer situation with the stale overpowered meta makes high level survivor boring and not fair. And for the killer side of things survivor perks are on the same tier list as killers where as four to six perks just are leagues above the others so as a high level killer you only go against survivors with the strongest perks and items, it makes the game so stale and it loses its fun easily. Overall: no fun after a while
Polecam, fajna gierka do pogrania ze znajomymi jak i samemu jako killer. Współpraca jest bardzo ważna aby uciec.

Très bon jeu, je recommande vivement, sauf si vous êtes allergiques au sel ^^

Le jeu est fun et a de bonnes mécaniques, autant en survivant qu'en tueur (même si je trouve le mode tueur plus amusant, n'en déplaise aux rageux) malgré les nombreux bugs et les hitboxes désastreuses pour absolument tout.
On a quand même droit à une grande variété de gameplays et de maps pour que ça ne soit pas trop redondant, enfin bon, les devs ont décidé de ne plus en mettre depuis quelques mois, on sait pas pourquoi. Au final le seul problème c'est le taux de sel dans le sang qui devient critique à force de monter de rang et de tomber sur des squads entières qui sont 5 rangs au-dessus de toi.
En bref si vous voulez vous amuser sans vous prendre la tête vous n'avez qu'à rester R20-10, et si vous montez plus haut... git gud ^^

The only reason I give it a thumbs up is because I still play it. It has the worst community, with every patch new bugs appear. They added boobs physics but the hitboxes are awful (priorities).
It is a fun game sometimes but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone tbh.

This game is riddled with bugs and issues that, at times, can make the game unplayable for one side or the other. Meta is so much stronger in this game than any other perk-set in the game that many times a trial may feel very one sided if one party did not bring the meta perks. Queue times for survivor past 8:00 pm EST can take 5-10 minutes to find a trial. Cosmetics cost more than the actual characters. I love this game and play it every day.

Edit June 2021: ^

Edit August 2021: RIP Demo :(

Edit November 2021: ^

é uma merda desbalanceada, assassinos quebrados e os parks tb esse jogo ta mais pra um 50/50 porque vc meio se diverte, mas na verdade se frusta ainda mais com os golpes que te dão uma volta no munto e a certam, joguei bastante pra ver se conseguia em algum momento desfrutar e tentar ficar melhor ate que fiquei mas com os golpes que te acertam a metros de distancia são ainda mais irritantes com os killers que te dão um hit pra cair

This game can be toxic at times. If you take it seriously. Otherwise. It can be very enjoyable. Doing your best to survive against so many different kinds of killers makes this game a challenge. Especially sense the killers are actual players. Completing generators to unlock exit gates is most of the battle. But so is surviving against the killer. If you have a group of friends to play wit. I'd highly recommend everyone to play this.
